about_the_game:
What is Leap Of Faith? 

In Leap Of Faith, you control Icarus, a green frog. In the game Icarus has access to a multitude of skills and abilities that he can use to Ascend the Wind Tunnel. 

Skills in order of difficulty : 

  • Jumping - Your standard Frog stuff, nothing too crazy.

  • Climbing - Icarus can scale any surface that isn't a Room Wall. 

  • Backflipping - Icarus can do a mighty leap backwards for maximum air. (Rad!) 

  • Grappling - Icarus can stick his Tongue out and pull himself to any surface that isn't a Room Wall that it hits! 

Are there Levels? 

In Leap Of Faith your main objective is to go up. Get higher. Ascend. If you fall that's on you. There are no levels in the traditional sense. However, there are multiple "Tiers" you can reach and they act as checkpoints of sorts. 

Are there side objectives?

There many collectable items that Icarus can find during the game, some of those are obtained through exploring and getting higher, and some are obtained other ways.

Are there any Save Points? 

The game does not save where Icarus was located the last time you played, so if you want to reach the end in one go you better clear your schedule. But all items that you collect during the game are saved. 

Note that the Leap Of Faith Playtest is only a limited time offer, and once the Beta phase is concluded you will no longer have access to Leap Of Faith Playtest. However, your progress during the Playtest should transfer if you purchase the official release.

name: Leap Of Faith
short_description: Hop into the unforgiving world of Leap Of Faith, where you can play as a frog, and he is green. Use a variety of powerful jumping abilities and movement skills to traverse a treacherous landscape. Jump high, eat the bugs, and climb your way to freedom in this exciting frog game.
